title: BRIEF-Indiabulls Housing: Pre-Funded Entire Maturity Proceeds To Axis Trustee In Bond Issue
text:
BRIEF-Indiabulls Housing: Pre-Funded Entire Maturity Proceeds To Axis Trustee In Bond Issue

Stock Markets 56 minutes ago (Oct 03, 2019 11:50)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Indiabulls Housing: Pre-Funded Entire Maturity Proceeds To Axis Trustee In Bond Issue Oct 3 (Reuters) - Indiabulls Housing Finance Ltd : * COMPANY HAS PRE-FUNDED ENTIRE MATURITY PROCEEDS TO AXIS TRUSTEE TWO WEEKS IN ADVANCE IN BOND ISSUE * WILL ISSUE AN OFFER AT PAR TO ALL DEBENTURE HOLDER(S) FOR PRE-MATURE REDEMPTION OF ALL NCDS MATURING IN OCT ON THURSDAY

BRIEF-Indiabulls Housing: Pre-Funded Entire Maturity Proceeds To Axis Trustee In Bond Issue
